name: Blueberry Champagne | Developed
description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: Jerry, NaChef, AlfredPudding, Max Savage, Graham, folkart, and ID10-T . 
This recipe is our version of a Blueberry Champagne. Full Development Notes on DIYORDIE Kindground Mixathon Funraiser https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E8FCKKD5FMc

Our weekly episodes will be released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/developedDIY
author: Developed

reviews.text: This stuff is delicious. Vaping it MTL on the Kayfun lite 2019, I don’t get too much blueberry but I find it difficult picking up blueberry in an MTL configuration. It’s still present, but I do get an incredibly authentic tasting champagne, literally the inhale tastes like drinking the champagne and the exhale tastes like the breath you take after the sip. No off notes whatsoever, and also not cloyingly sweet. Very good recipe. I also liked that coffee bacco on YouTube a lot too, you guys should post that up on here!
